lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to give to those budding entrepreneurs around the world who want to build a better life for themselves and be independent and free.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a team of software developers who provide ways for people to get more information and improve the process within which they work.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: I am so grateful for all of the support and generosity that I've received in my life and want to offer some of that spirit back, particularly to other women working in agriculture and food businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a small farm growing vegetables, raising dairy goats, and keeping laying chickens.  I also work with nonprofit organizations (NGOs) as a teacher and facilitator.

lenders.name: Colin
lenders.loan_because: A little help can sometimes make an enormous difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a businessman.  I advise the management of large organisations.  I help them improve their performance or their profitability.

lenders.name: Tory
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone needs a little help from time to time.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a exhibit marketing company that improves the way other companies market their products to possible buyers at various events. My role is to make sure that everything goes well at the event, and that we stick to a pre-determined budget.  I basically do what a wedding planner does, but, instead of planning weddings,  I work on events that show-off cars, software, and gadgets for the purpose of encouraging possible customers to purchase the products on display,

lenders.name: kim
lenders.loan_because: People gave me a "leg up" when I needed it,I like to do the same for others.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is very fulfilling! I like people and work with people and kids.

lenders.name: Barret
lenders.loan_because: I would like to support the growth and development of industrious people around the world who don't have all of the opportunities that have been present in my own life.  In this way, I also wish to demonstrate that the sometimes undemocratic actions and policies of the US Government do not always represent the sentiments of it's citizens.
lenders.occupational_info: I spend most of each day writing computer programs, sometimes like this very website!

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: Because I can. and should
lenders.occupational_info: Graduate looking for work

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.occupation: Bad dancer and Chemist for hire
lenders.loan_because: I can and it's sort of fun.

lenders.name: Dawndrea
lenders.loan_because: I love.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I and other Canadians and American's take advantage of the beautiful parts of these developing countries, but going to the resorts there doesn't contribute back much to the local community or inner cities!...This way helps a little bit.

lenders.name: Yohanna Isreala
lenders.loan_because:
I want to Touch as many LiVEs as I can thoughout the World   
and 
KiVA makes that POSSiBLE............

lenders.name: Jochen
lenders.occupational_info: I am helping to automate any kind of processes to improve transparenzy and efficiency

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: I've started my own successful business and it's given me great satisfaction. I'd like to give other people the same opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: We program computer software and web sites using Java and FileMaker Pro.

lenders.name: Connie
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand at some point in their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the business matters of a public school system.

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because: Micro lending is an empowering way to provide support to those wishing to uplift themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Provide information to help people lead healthier, more vibrant lives.

lenders.name: Hans
lenders.loan_because: We are all part of the same world without equal opportunities.

lenders.name: april
lenders.loan_because: We were put on this earth to help and serve one another.  I only wish I could contribute  more.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a school library for special education, Deaf and Blind students. We check-out adaptive equipment  such as braille and large print books. braille paper, switch's, braille note takers.

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.loan_because: Because I can.

lenders.name: Kawan
lenders.loan_because: no one should be denied the chance to work towards their goals simply because of their financial situation—not when others have the ability to help.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: It's nice to be able to help people.

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because: it makes a difference.

lenders.name: andrew
lenders.loan_because: I can afford to
lenders.occupational_info: Building things

lenders.name: Cat and Sandy
lenders.loan_because: We love the feeling it gives us to know we're helping!

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: it makes a lot of sense and it's easy.
lenders.occupational_info: I help other people do their jobs.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I've had other people help me get my business off the ground, and I would like to return the favor to another entrepreneur.

lenders.name: Pascal
lenders.loan_because:
I want to be rich!!!!

What?!?! I won't be rich on Kiva ?!?! Crap...

lenders.name: Boye
lenders.loan_because: It helps others and to learn about others.

lenders.name: Xan
lenders.loan_because: My friend Andrew gave a donation gift to get me started.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm still mostly learning.

lenders.name: Search4CareerColleges
lenders.loan_because: The Search4CareerColleges.com team has a similar philosophy as Kiva, we help people change their direction in life through opportunities to start a new career path. It’s a perfect match for us to get involved with. We desire to see more businesses lending on this site.
lenders.occupational_info: Our Search4CareerColleges.com site helps people look for technical schools and find the right career training program for them.

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference in the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Kindergarten.

lenders.name: Robbin
lenders.loan_because:
It's the best way to pay it forward.
We are all in this together!
lenders.occupational_info: I raise Alpacas for their warm fiber. They are a renewable source, humane and earth friendly! They also are so much fun to love and hug!

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because:
I too come from a country that is considered to be 3rd world. I began my company in a country other than where I am from. I too know the difficulties of being an Entrepreneur; with no one believing in my abilities as an entrepreneur.

I hope with a loan; I am able to contribute to someone's dream of becoming an Entrepreneur.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Event Planner. I currently work freelance, but aim on developing events for my company.

lenders.name: Jody
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. I was born into a good family and a comfortable life in an affluent society. I am well educated, in good health and have choices in my life. I recognize this good fortune and I want to be able to share it with others who have not been so fortunate, but who are working to change their situations and create better lives for themselves, their families and children.
lenders.occupational_info: My work involves helping other people to find within themselves the power to change. Life coaching is a professional service in which coaches work with individuals (or groups) who desire a change in their lives but who may feel stuck in a current situation or way of being. Coaches believe that individuals have their own inner resources to solve their problems or attain their goals. So my job is to be a partner with the client, providing him or her with a different perspective and some techniques and action plans that help the client to find the solution within, take steps forward, and reach his or her goals.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to build themselves the life they wish to lead.  Not everyone has been given the opportunity to do so and through this website and others like it people are able to create more productive and healthier lives for them and their families.

lenders.name: Jacob
lenders.loan_because: $25 to someone in need is better than buying beer or video games.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell coffee, make custom drinks, and try my best to make each customer's day a little brighter.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an educator. Knowledge is power, and I want to make sure everyone can access that power. I also want to travel.

lenders.name: meredith
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life. I often give to charities, but never see what happens to the money I give.  For once I would like to see my money at work, and when it's done...be able to have someone else benefit from the same money.  I want to make a "gift that keeps on giving."  People not only make a living, but also build confidence, pride, and respect for themselves as they earn their own money!!  I want to be part of that. I also want to return a small part of what God has blessed me with to others!!  I don't have alot of money, but I have been blessed enough to help make a difference...that's what I want to do!!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a self employed accountant.  I do work out of my home out of a small office.  I also raise livestock...pygmy goats and horses...for fun, but also a little income. I am very involved in the life of my young son.  So, I try to work many different small jobs so that I can be a mother whenever he needs me. I am also a college instructor that teaches accounting on a contract basis at a college.  I work nights, so I can be home with my son when he comes home from school.  When he's grown, I hope to have just one full-time job as an instructor at the local college. I hope then I can help more people in areas like this because I'll have more of the financial ability to do so!!!

lenders.name: Hayley
lenders.loan_because: We loan as the PaixQuebecPeace conference to thank our speakers and panelists for contributing their time to our project.
lenders.occupational_info: Exposing people from different backgrounds, with different opinions, and different experiences to one another to explore how we can better live together.  The forum is a daylong, bilingual peace-education conference in Montreal.

lenders.name: Natalie Portmans head
lenders.loan_because: It creates opportunities to get a Head.
lenders.occupational_info: Natural

lenders.name: CCLA
lenders.loan_because: Teaching the kids the importance of giving and how you can change the world.

lenders.name: Bill & Donna
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to fufill thier dreams. By helping others, we help ourselves.

lenders.name: ClarkUSEClass
lenders.loan_because: This account was setup for Clark University's Social Entrepreneurship Class in 2008. We'd like to thank our professor for encouraging us to get involved with this site.
lenders.occupational_info: We are students. Our work is reading and writing. Then we graduate and enter the real world.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I am saving for my retirement, but hate the idea of all that money sitting in the bank for the next 50+ years. So I am investing it in Kiva, so that while I wait I can help the world, like Jesus would
lenders.occupational_info: I don't have a real job yet :) This money is all from babysitting or gifts.

lenders.name: Johan
lenders.loan_because: Don't mind giving money. Looks like this might work over time.

lenders.name: Ellie
lenders.loan_because: There is a difference between wants and needs.  All my life, my needs have been fulfilled with ease, as have many of my wants.  In Costa Rica, I see people struggling every day just to meet very basic needs and I am overcome with a sense of guilt and gratitude.  As a child, I learned that "to whom much has been given, much will be expected."  As an adult, this means to me that if I have the ability to help others, then to do so is a moral obligation.  Not a choice.

lenders.name: Eve
lenders.loan_because: I feel this is one area I can help impact the world I live in and help make it a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure that schools have the technology they need to teach students effectively

lenders.name: Dennis and linda
lenders.loan_because: We want to help make an impact
lenders.occupational_info: Dennis is a chef for special children and Linda is an artist and teacher of special adults with disabilites

lenders.name: Nico
lenders.loan_because: I believe everbody deserves a shot at life! I count my blessings every day and I wish for  everyone to live your dreams!
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a a grocery store in The Netherlands.

lenders.name: Ørjan
lenders.loan_because: Because I can.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: This just may change the world.

lenders.name: john
lenders.loan_because: I care for the best.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a mechanic to make new ideas work.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I have more than enough. I want to share, help enrich another woman's life.
lenders.occupational_info: 911 emergency  phone operator & radio dispatch for law enforcement,  fire & medical.

lenders.name: Mom- Isabelle and Brodie
lenders.loan_because: My favorite cousin gave me this present to give! I want to teach my children how to make this world a better place if we help people in need of making their own world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a full time mother to my young children.

lenders.name: Shelly
lenders.loan_because: You get a chance to do something small yet magnanimous in someone elses life.  You invest and you give hope to someone thousands of miles away
lenders.occupational_info: Develop screenplays and projects to make into small to mid-size  feature films.

lenders.name: Lynne
lenders.loan_because: I want the world to change, and I want to help with that change.
lenders.occupational_info: Liz liked to think of herself as a philosopher, rather than a writer.  But she did write a book, The descent of religion: its evolution from nurturing to bullying . . . and back!,  which is available on Amazon.

lenders.name: Robert Hernandez
lenders.loan_because: there are those who have all the will in the world to succeed but lack the money to get started.  No one who wants it so bad should be denied the opportunity to achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I coach families and individuals on how to make their money grow.

lenders.name: Barb and Todd
lenders.loan_because: We can.

lenders.name: Howard
lenders.loan_because: I loan because Kiva is a much better alternative to traditional "charity".  The people who receive the loans are allowed to maintain their dignity and self respect because of 2 fundamental principles found here, namely, hard work and financial responsibility.  Traditonal charity has neither of these principles, which is why it will never work in the long run.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a GIS (Geographic Information System) specialist.  In simple terms, GIS is is a combination of a relational database and a mapping program.

lenders.name: Anita
lenders.loan_because: it can change people's lives and build communities.

lenders.name: Jeanette & Dominique
lenders.loan_because: ...it makes a positive difference to both the lender and the recipient :)

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a retail store

lenders.name: Sryn
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is my responsibility to help others up the 'ladder'.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach how to use computers to secondary school students.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I want the world to be better than it is now, and I know I can do small things to make sure that happens.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a profession that is very meaningful to me.  I spend a lot of time travelling around the world.

lenders.name: Charlene
lenders.loan_because: It is important to give back.  Such a simple gesture.
lenders.occupational_info: I have always given of myself to my community, it is time to give to orthes.

lenders.name: Mason
lenders.loan_because: My $25 means a lot more to them than it does to me.

lenders.name: louise
lenders.loan_because: I want to help the world be a better place for us all.  To help elminate poverty and hunger and give those receiving loans a great gift of self esteem.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired and have worked many years in accounting and have raised a fun family of 3 children.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: Helping someone else is one of the greatest gifts you can give yourself and the planet.
lenders.occupational_info: I write letters to foundations asking them to give money to non-governmental organizations who help people in need.

lenders.name: Tamara
lenders.loan_because: I want to act globaly.
lenders.occupational_info: Shaping minds and developing futures.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: It is such a blessing to me to reach out to people I will never meet, and somehow touch their lives in a small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I photograph people at different stages in their life, as babies, when they graduate, and amongst family members

lenders.name: Lena
lenders.loan_because: These people deserve my money exponentially more than any corporation in America.
lenders.occupational_info: Student

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: my small contribution has the greatest reach and impact when it is combined with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Information Technology to train, analyze, develop and improve business processes and data usage - I strive to make companies more efficient and more productive.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: Because I can and I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a physician in a Hospital Emergency Department.

lenders.name: Jim and Cate
lenders.loan_because: Hope and hard work can lead to wonders large and small.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people with an entrepreneurial spirit who want to work to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I've had too much in life, and too many have had too little. This is a step toward righting that wrong.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a writer and editor interested in international affairs, development economics, and football, among other issues.

lenders.name: Paedaretus
lenders.loan_because: I lived in Jakarta in 1997 and have fond memories of the place.  I hope I can help.  And now I am disappointed to see that we have almost no one in Indonesia we can lend to.  I wonder why.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with financial resources.  I believe I have an obligation to share with others and to be a good steward.
lenders.occupational_info: Responsible for the accounting and financial reporting for a Fortune 500 Company.  I have an obligation to the Company's investors to prepare and report accurate financial results.

lenders.name: kinnosuke
lenders.loan_because: I want someone to be happy with my little help.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: It's important to me to help to break the cycle of poverty. I am convinced that micro-finance is one way to accomplish that.

lenders.name: Sonia
lenders.loan_because: I believe you should be the change you want to see.
lenders.occupational_info: I research and learn about people of African descent all over the world.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is important for people to share with one another. It opens my heart to share and I love supporting others to realize their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I write nonfiction books about spirituality and health. And I counsel people who want to write books about how to get published.

lenders.name: Adam and Mary
lenders.loan_because: Our life is great, and we want to share our good fortune.
lenders.occupational_info: Adam fixes the connections between computers across the world.  Mary works for a doctor, is in charge of all the medical assistants, and makes the serum for allergy shots.

lenders.name: Jonathan and Lesley
lenders.loan_because: We want to help out people who need help, and we love the idea that our assistance can be used many times over by reinvesting our loan once it's paid back. What better way to make our globalized world feel a little smaller and more human?
lenders.occupational_info:
Jonathan works at a newspaper, where he writes about art and music and books.
Lesley is an artist who teaches young adults how to make art.
We have one son named Abraham, who is three and loves people.

lenders.name: Roger
lenders.loan_because: Social capital is the most precious commodity in which we can invest.
lenders.occupational_info: I help explore the many ways technology  improves our existence.

lenders.name: Casey
lenders.loan_because: it's a great way to make an impact in somebody's life, and you can see how your donation is making positive changes in the world
lenders.occupational_info: I protect the health of the public, by monitoring food, water sources and air quality for issues that may cause harm to human health.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I believe in micro-loans human and economical impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I create advertising campaigns for business owners in the US and in France.... colorful logos, unique web sites and magazine ads are my day to day environment... I love working with business owners and I can't wait to tell them about KIVA

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled extensively around the world and have seen first-hand the spirit and determination of people of all nationalities to better their lives and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: The gift of a massage is one of easing pain, whether it be physical or emotional. The miracles of touch cannot be explained by science but have the power to change the world...one person at a time.

lenders.name: Tim and Ilene
lenders.loan_because: Our business would have gone under if not for the generosity of a benefactor loan.  We want to "pass it on" in a what small way we can.
lenders.occupational_info: We own a restaurant in an economically depressed  rural community in the Ozark Mountains.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I am passionate about the Earth, agriculture and trying to help end rural poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: In my own business, I am working to change the way big American companies do business.  Showing them how their buying decisions affect rural poverty helps them to adopt fairer business practices that give more of the economic benefits of global trade back to the small farmer.

lenders.name: Terukazu
lenders.loan_because: I can connect to many people

lenders.name: Khadija
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the empowerment of every individual.

lenders.name: Lynsee
lenders.loan_because:
I loan because I can. I loan because I have access to limitless opportunities and abundance that a vast majority of people in the world today will never know.
I have a roof over my head, clean running water, heat in my home, a variety of nutritious food, electricity, a selection of clothing, transportation, a job, access to education, quality health care, freedom of religion and politics, security, equality, no threat of any kind to my life or the lives of my loved ones, and I have so much more than all this.
I loan because it's the least I can do to help those who do not share these basic human rights.

lenders.name: Douglas
lenders.loan_because: The more people help each each other the more peaceful the world will be.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a technology coordinator for a public school district.  I maintain about 400 computers, keep the servers running in two buildings, help teachers with technology professional development, and many other tech related tasks.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: I was introduced to Kiva by a previous salon owner. I now loan because everyone needs a little help sometimes, and I am also a small business owner! I understand that it takes a little extra push sometimes.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide hairstyling and other beauty services.  I also educate other hair stylists, teaching hair color theory, techniques, cutting, and texture techniques.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I care and I want to make the world a better place for families.

lenders.name: Takahiro
lenders.loan_because: I want to do more than just paying bills with my tight income. I'm more than happy to spare a little money to make differences in other people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a well-known automaker, in a project to make safety devices.

lenders.name: The Steward Family
lenders.loan_because: It's a fun way for our family to learn about how others live and how we are all interconnected.

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because: We are one and we need to help each other through this wonderful journey of life.

lenders.name: The Mock Family
lenders.occupational_info: I run a restaurant, while my wife works for a social expression  internet website company.

lenders.name: payit forward
lenders.loan_because: it's a simple yet grand concept - and my mom and i can help.

lenders.name: Vera
lenders.loan_because: We are all neighbors on this planet.
lenders.occupational_info: As a student now, I am drawing together what I have learned as a teacher, entrepreneur and artist in the past.

lenders.name: Buddy
lenders.loan_because: This time it makes sence and I feel good that I can, and do...

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: it helps people better themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I counsel people in crisis that come into the hospital Emergency Department.

lenders.name: joshua
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Brittany
lenders.loan_because: we are engaging in micro-lending projects for my international business management class and this seems like a wonderful opportunity!
lenders.occupational_info: I am an International Relations major with a minor in Spanish at a liberal arts school in New Hampshire.

lenders.name: Gillian
lenders.occupational_info: Holistic Therapy is pleasant, non invasive and used to treat a variety of conditions or simply to reduce stress.  It treats the person rather than the ailment and brings wholeness in the body, mind and spirit.

lenders.name: Source Legacy
lenders.loan_because: Well, it's not just me who loans under my name -- it's my entire organization (The Source Legacy Foundation, Inc.).  Many people within our organization make donations each week so that we are able to help individuals in the world.  I LOVE Kiva because it is so ingenious, and because it allows the individual to grown and expand (or just survive) in a dignified way that allows them to maintain their self-respect.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a ministerial organization at our core, but we also each creative empowerment and life skills to a large cross-section of the public in a number of our unique and inspiring programs.

lenders.name: Muraleetharan
lenders.loan_because: Microcredit plays a vital role in eliminating poverty around the world by promoting self-employment.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the computer field for a major financial industry.

lenders.name: Clare
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense.

lenders.name: garret
lenders.loan_because: I know the money is going to some one who needs it much more then me.

lenders.name: Kelly & Leonard
lenders.loan_because: We are blessed in order to bless others.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a BRILLIANT idea. What an easy yet fantastic way to help someone improve their life! I LOVE that the end goal is about sustainability and empowerment.
lenders.occupational_info: My wife and I run a small graphic design firm, creating magazines, websites and all sorts of marketing materials for clients all over the United States.

lenders.name: Travis
lenders.loan_because: A United States dollar, even under duress, can do a lot more in other parts of the world. It is easy to devalue a dollar, and lose sight of its ability to feed a family somewhere else.
lenders.occupational_info: I invest in houses to be built and sold.

lenders.name: Mary and Chris
lenders.loan_because: We want to help others help themselves, as others have done for us over the years.
lenders.occupational_info:
Mary: I'm a midwife delivering babies for women of all ages and backgrounds.
Chris:  I'm a mental health therapist learning the many ways in which people create their lives.

lenders.name: Ken Hill
lenders.occupational_info: Actually I currently live and work in Tokyo Japan

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I can and I can't imagine why I shouldn't

lenders.name: Transplanted Brit
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a 'helping hand' at some point in their lives......

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: I have a good life and want to share what I can, directly to those who need help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with doctors and nurses in a clinic helping pregnant women.  I make sure everyone is doing their job and treating our patients well.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: Our kids help fund this by doing chores around the house and we hope it helps to teach them social responsibility.

lenders.name: Rosita & MiaSol
lenders.loan_because: I would like to return to the universe the good fortune of  receiving help and guidance when my family has needed it.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach classes at a vegan culinary program and I help students with their studies and graduation. We teach how to cook seasonal and local whole foods to heal and prevent disease.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: Both my wife and I have been to Africa, and a part of our hearts are still there. I will never forget the hospitality and goodness of the people we met.
lenders.occupational_info:
Photography and web hosting.
http://www.pixations.net

lenders.name: Albert
lenders.loan_because: John 3:16
lenders.occupational_info: Love

lenders.name: Anthony Wong
lenders.loan_because: Wherever there is a human being, there is an opportunity for kindness.
lenders.occupational_info: Humanity can only improve as people improve.  When you have improved your life, you can inspire those around you to want to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Miluna
lenders.loan_because: I can.  Because it feels so good.  Because this helps others live in self-reliance and self-respect.
lenders.occupational_info: I help others find the magic within their Voice.  To heal through finding our voice and power.  To learn about the world as a singer, actor, speaker.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help and create positivity for the future

Martin Luther King, Jr.,

lenders.name: Maria

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: The thought of exploring has always driven me to be curious about the world around me and push myself to fulfill my potentials. Everyone should be given the opportunities to follow their dreams and live up to their potentials without unjust restrictions.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying for a Bachelors of Science in Aerospace Engineering. I focus in human space settlement and international relations. In other words, I'm trying to find ways for people like you and me to live better both on the earth and off of it.

lenders.name: Garrick & Andrea
lenders.loan_because: Providing unimpeded lending opportunities to hard working individuals.
lenders.occupational_info: Help for economic needs for hard working men and women to create income for schooling, more jobs, and family health

lenders.name: Christie
lenders.loan_because: I lived in Nigeria as a child. My parents were teachers. It changed me. It changed my family. Neither I, nor my children, nor my children's children will ever take for granted the tremendous gifts and opportunities we have as US citizens. I give because I need to share what little I have with those who have much, much less -- and will do much, much more with my little $100 than I ever could.
lenders.occupational_info: I write books on computers for other people to learn how to use computers. I have also raised two children as a single mom and was unemployed for over five years. I look for loans where there is a family without a paid worker or a hard-working single mom. Nothing is more heartbreaking than not being able to make enough money to care for your children no matter how hard you try. For me to recover, it took the kindness and trust of the families where I was a nanny. Their faith in me and the opportunities they offered turned my life around. Now, with Kiva, I can return the favor to others!

lenders.name: Barry & P.K.
lenders.loan_because: To one degree or another we've all been helped in our careers and lives by others; and in turn most of us have helped those immediately around us.  Kiva offers the opportunity to lend a hand to those where help and support are not readily available or may not exist at all.
lenders.occupational_info: HR consultant and entrepreneur (Barry); executive director of Fife Chamber of Commerce (PK)

lenders.name: Brett
lenders.loan_because:
This is not a handout. This is a hand up to a better way of living.

If everyone helps a little then no one person has to help a lot.
lenders.occupational_info: Work to keep telecommunications and internet expanding and working. Also work in agriculture and train horses.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make it in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: bake breads and pastries that are sold at the grocery store.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: It was a Christmas gift from my uncle.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to be an engineer.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help others that are trying to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an owner / operator of a small transportation company.

lenders.loan_because: Hey, why does anybody do anything?

lenders.name: Green Finds, Inc.
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed by the Entrepreneur  Angels. I have been a self-made businessman since the age of  17, Man I gota tell you there have been plenty times time when I needed a small loan to get back  up and  I had nowhere to go for that. So now that im back up... many times over,  I feel blessed and want to share my wealth with my fellow entrepreneurs.  It's amazing the small amount that is needed to continue a small business, its the passion that really drives a small business not the multi million dollar funding that we think we need in the States.
lenders.occupational_info: Greenfinds.com is a online retail store and also organizes designer sample sales "Samples for (eco)mpassion" that support various charities.

lenders.name: Stephan
lenders.loan_because: Gotta do something to help

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I believe that its our moral responsibility to help one another.  I enjoy knowing that I'm helping someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a clinic part time and later in the day I work at an after school program.  I'm a mother to three wonderful children.

lenders.name: Gus the Drover
lenders.loan_because: With appropriate capital resources, anyone can grab onto the entreprenuerial spirit and become prosperous through hard work and determination.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a cowboy.  Just like the movies.

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: I love God and I want to use His money for good!

lenders.name: sheila parks&mike taylor
lenders.loan_because: there must be a reason why we are taught to share our toys and sweets when we are children. it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: i (sheila) am currently recovering from a traumatic injury and spend time researching pain conditions on the internet; my husband (mike) works at a hotel and is the manager of the housekeeping department

lenders.name: Arun
lenders.loan_because: I think all of us should have a sense of social responsibility to promote ideas and thought processes that help in creating self sustaining economic activities. We take so much from this world, we can after all lend some back for good causes.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a team of computer software engineers who create IT applications.

lenders.name: Lee and Joey
lenders.loan_because: We both know how it feels to have someone give a helping hand.  We are both Christians and would like to share Jesus's love for all people.
lenders.occupational_info: Lee teaches 4th grade students (students who are 9 or 10 years old).  Joey teaches 8th grade science (students who are 13 or 14 years old).

lenders.name: Joanna
lenders.loan_because: Because I can and I should. This is a part of my investment in myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I write technical documents.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I want to teach my children the power of giving and karma.
lenders.occupational_info: I prepare young children for public school.  I teach them the basics (ABC's and 123's) plus social skills, confidence, and respect.  Did I mention we have a blast too!

lenders.name: SHAMA
lenders.occupational_info: Computer Application Developer

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: other people helped me when I started my own business
lenders.occupational_info: I am a part-time bookkeeper, who also is a singer and writes songs for a living

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.occupational_info: I do research on plants.  We hope to learn how to increase plant yields, so that people can grow more food and so that we can afford to use more plants for fuel.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference directly.
lenders.occupational_info: I help homeowners pay off their houses in as little as one-third to one-half the time using current income.  I also help folks get solar power with no money out of pocket.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do and it can foster independence.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Someone helped me out in the past and I promised that I would pay it forward.  I like to help others and I hope that those who are successful in their projects might do the same for someone else when they can.
lenders.occupational_info: I edit television shows and movies that play all around the world for hundreds of millions of people.  I use computers to select the pictures, sounds, and music that people watch, listen, and hopefully enjoy.  I get to be very creative and work with lots of different types of people, sometimes I get to travel and see other parts of the world.  Every day I get to communicate new ideas and entertain others.  It's a lot of fun.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.occupation: VP in a large hospital system
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy sharing some of my rewards with others that are trying to better their life's situation.
lenders.occupational_info: The hospitals I work for help people get better every day.  50% of our profits are given back to the community.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: There are so many inequities in the world and so much constant bad news...we need to help our neighbors, no matter how far away, to pull themselves from poverty.

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: Charity is really important to me.  I feel that if we have the resources--even just the smallest--we have the responsibility to share.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: My life is filled with God's blessings. I want to share my blessings with others.

lenders.name: Hermilando
lenders.loan_because: I need to expand my printing business.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide technical assistance to local government units. I also print all sorts of information materials and use printing equipment like photocopying machines, ringbinder, printers, etc.

lenders.name: Penny
lenders.loan_because: I truly believe in the resoursefulness  of people with little income. It is so wonderful to be able to give them a step up even in the smallest way.
lenders.occupational_info: I have taught kindergarten children and children with special needs for 36 years here in Hamilton, Canada

lenders.name: Carole
lenders.loan_because: I am self-employed and I know how difficult it can be to get started. I find working for myself is very rewarding and enjoy seeing others beginning a new venture on their own. I

lenders.name: Lee & Karen
lenders.loan_because: We can.

lenders.name: Jong Yang
lenders.loan_because: We must not, in trying to think about how we can make a big difference, ignore the small daily differences we can make which, over time, add up to big differences that we often cannot foresee

lenders.name: Donald
lenders.loan_because: It is the best way I have found to help people that need a hand getting started.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good! I'm not rich by American standards, but my little loan can make a big difference and I like that.
lenders.occupational_info: I help adults learn English as a second language.

lenders.name: Brendan
lenders.loan_because: There are hard-working people in the world that are looking for a hand up, not a hand out, and they deserve the opportunity to succeed.
